titles.title: To limit the duration of payments of expenses of former Speakers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H1691)
Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Accounts.

bill.summary: 3/30/1993--Introduced. Limits the period for which expenses of a former Speaker of the House of Representatives may be paid to one year after the expiration of the term of office as Representative. (Provides that in the case of a former Speaker who is receiving such expenses on the date of the enactment of this Act, the period shall end one year after such date.)
